SIRV_BUCKET.description: Your Sirv account name (e.g., `mycompany`). Find it in your [Sirv Dashboard](https://my.sirv.com/).

SIRV_S3_KEY.description: S3 Access Key from [Sirv Dashboard → Settings → S3 API](https://my.sirv.com/#/account/settings/api).

SIRV_S3_SECRET.description: S3 Secret Key from [Sirv Dashboard → Settings → S3 API](https://my.sirv.com/#/account/settings/api).
